CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 19, 1958, pg. A13 reads: "Iotas Honor Two - Sorors of Iota Phi Lambda honored two Western Pennsylvania women last Saturday at a banquet at the Greene Hearthe. Named the Outstanding Businesswoman of the Year was Mrs. LaRue Frederick, mortician, shown receiving a scroll from Anne Penn of Pi Chapter.  Mrs. Hazel Garland, member of the Courier's editorial staff and columnist, was made an honorary member of the business sorority.  Left to right are Mrs. Jeanne S. Farrish, president of the Pittsburgh chapter; Mrs. Penn, Mrs. Gladys Howell who, with Mrs. Florence Ball Jones co-chaired Business Week; Mrs. Frederick and Mrs. Garland. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Iota Phi Lambda members Jeanne S. Farrish, Anne Penn, and Gladys Howell, honoring LaRue Frederick as Outstanding Businesswoman of the Year, standing in the Greene Hearth
